scripts.postinstall: pnpm ensure-license && echo "	\033[0;36mKeep Smelterial up-to-date: run \033[0;0m\`\033[0;32mpnpm update -r\033[0;0m\`\033[0m"
scripts.all: turbo lint --filter=[HEAD^1] --filter=!*-TODO && turbo test --filter=[HEAD^1] --filter=!*-TODO && pnpm postinstall
scripts.dev:
echo "STARTING ALL DEV SERVERS
Using \`--filter=\"<app name>\"\` is recommended" && sleep 1 && turbo dev --filter=!*-TODO
scripts.changeset: pnpm exec changeset && git add ./.changeset/*.md && git stash -k && PRIVATE_NO_HOOKS=true git commit -m ":bookmark: (changeset): Changeset" && git stash pop
